segment.source: Working with AppLocker policies (Windows 10)
segment.target: Working with AppLocker policies (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals provides links to procedural topics about creating, maintaining, and testing AppLocker policies.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals provides links to procedural topics about creating, maintaining, and testing AppLocker policies.

segment.source: Working with AppLocker policies
segment.target: Working with AppLocker policies

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals provides links to procedural topics about creating, maintaining, and testing AppLocker policies.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals provides links to procedural topics about creating, maintaining, and testing AppLocker policies.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Configure the Application Identity service
segment.target: Configure the Application Identity service

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals shows how to configure the Application Identity service to start automatically or manually.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals shows how to configure the Application Identity service to start automatically or manually.

segment.source: Configure an AppLocker policy for audit only
segment.target: Configure an AppLocker policy for audit only

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes how to set AppLocker policies to Audit only within your IT environment by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes how to set AppLocker policies to Audit only within your IT environment by using AppLocker.

segment.source: Configure an AppLocker policy for enforce rules
segment.target: Configure an AppLocker policy for enforce rules

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to enable the AppLocker policy enforcement setting.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to enable the AppLocker policy enforcement setting.

segment.source: Display a custom URL message when users try to run a blocked app
segment.target: Display a custom URL message when users try to run a blocked app

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps for displaying a customized message to users when an AppLocker policy denies access to an app.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps for displaying a customized message to users when an AppLocker policy denies access to an app.

segment.source: Export an AppLocker policy from a GPO
segment.target: Export an AppLocker policy from a GPO

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy from a Group Policy Object (GPO) so that it can be modified.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy from a Group Policy Object (GPO) so that it can be modified.

segment.source: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file
segment.target: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.

segment.source: Import an AppLocker policy from another computer
segment.target: Import an AppLocker policy from another computer

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes how to import an AppLocker policy.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes how to import an AppLocker policy.

segment.source: Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO
segment.target: Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to import an AppLocker policy into a Group Policy Object (GPO).
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to import an AppLocker policy into a Group Policy Object (GPO).

segment.source: Add rules for packaged apps to existing AppLocker rule-set
segment.target: Add rules for packaged apps to existing AppLocker rule-set

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes how to update your existing AppLocker policies for packaged apps using the Remote Server Administration Toolkit (RSAT).
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes how to update your existing AppLocker policies for packaged apps using the Remote Server Administration Toolkit (RSAT).

segment.source: Merge AppLocker policies by using Set-ApplockerPolicy
segment.target: Merge AppLocker policies by using Set-ApplockerPolicy

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to merge AppLocker policies by using Windows PowerShell.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to merge AppLocker policies by using Windows PowerShell.

segment.source: Merge AppLocker policies manually
segment.target: Merge AppLocker policies manually

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to manually merge AppLocker policies to update the Group Policy Object (GPO).
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to manually merge AppLocker policies to update the Group Policy Object (GPO).

segment.source: Refresh an AppLocker policy
segment.target: Refresh an AppLocker policy

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to force an update for an AppLocker policy.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to force an update for an AppLocker policy.

segment.source: Test an AppLocker policy by using Test-AppLockerPolicy
segment.target: Test an AppLocker policy by using Test-AppLockerPolicy

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to test an AppLocker policy prior to importing it into a Group Policy Object (GPO) or another computer.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to test an AppLocker policy prior to importing it into a Group Policy Object (GPO) or another computer.
